pages.text: Only affect slash-type spells. Slash spells deal 0.5 additional damage, have 10% reduced cooldown, and have slightly wider area of effect. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_lethality)Path of Lethality$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter grows a keen edge. Imbues onto the Scepter of Blades and persists through the Path of Lethality
